And the rulers<S>8269</S> of the people<S>5971</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: the rest<S>7605</S> of the people<S>5971</S> also cast<S>5307</S> lots<S>1486</S>, to bring<S>935</S> one<S>259</S> of ten<S>6235</S> to dwell<S>3427</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S> the holy<S>6944</S> city<S>5892</S>, and nine<S>8672</S> parts<S>3027</S> to dwell in other cities<S>5892</S>.
And the people<S>5971</S> blessed<S>1288</S> all the men<S>582</S>, that willingly offered<S>5068</S> themselves to dwell<S>3427</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S>.
Now these are the chief<S>7218</S> of the province<S>4082</S> that dwelt<S>3427</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: but in the cities<S>5892</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> every one<S>376</S> in his possession<S>272</S> in their cities<S>5892</S>, to wit, Israel<S>3478</S>, the priests<S>3548</S>, and the Levites<S>3881</S>, and the Nethinims<S>5411</S>, and the children<S>1121</S> of Solomon's<S>8010</S> servants<S>5650</S>.
And at Jerusalem<S>3389</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> certain of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, and of the children<S>1121</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>. Of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>; Athaiah<S>6265</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Uzziah<S>5818</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zechariah<S>2148</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Amariah<S>568</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shephatiah<S>8203</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Mahalaleel<S>4111</S>, of the children<S>1121</S> of Perez<S>6557</S>; <sup>Perez: or, Pharez</sup>
And Maaseiah<S>4641</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Baruch<S>1263</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Colhozeh<S>3626</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hazaiah<S>2382</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Adaiah<S>5718</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Joiarib<S>3114</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zechariah<S>2148</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Shiloni<S>8023</S>.
All the sons<S>1121</S> of Perez<S>6557</S> that dwelt<S>3427</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S> were four<S>702</S> hundred<S>3967</S> threescore<S>8346</S> and eight<S>8083</S> valiant<S>2428</S> men<S>582</S>.
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>; Sallu<S>5543</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Meshullam<S>4918</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Joed<S>3133</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Pedaiah<S>6305</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Kolaiah<S>6964</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Maaseiah<S>4641</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Ithiel<S>384</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Jesaiah<S>3470</S>.
And after<S>310</S> him Gabbai<S>1373</S>, Sallai<S>5543</S>, nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> twenty<S>6242</S> and eight<S>8083</S>.
And Joel<S>3100</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zichri<S>2147</S> was their overseer<S>6496</S>: and Judah<S>3063</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Senuah<S>5574</S> was second<S>4932</S> over the city<S>5892</S>.
Of the priests<S>3548</S>: Jedaiah<S>3048</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Joiarib<S>3114</S>, Jachin<S>3199</S>.
Seraiah<S>8304</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Hilkiah<S>2518</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Meshullam<S>4918</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zadok<S>6659</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Meraioth<S>4812</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Ahitub<S>285</S>, was the ruler<S>5057</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of God<S>430</S>.
And their brethren<S>251</S> that did<S>6213</S> the work<S>4399</S> of the house<S>1004</S> were eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> twenty<S>6242</S> and two<S>8147</S>: and Adaiah<S>5718</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jeroham<S>3395</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Pelaliah<S>6421</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Amzi<S>557</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zechariah<S>2148</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Pashur<S>6583</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Malchiah<S>4441</S>,
And his brethren<S>251</S>, chief<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S>, two<S>8147</S> hundred<S>3967</S> forty<S>705</S> and two<S>8147</S>: and Amashai<S>6023</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Azareel<S>5832</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Ahasai<S>273</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Meshillemoth<S>4919</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Immer<S>564</S>,
And their brethren<S>251</S>, mighty men<S>1368</S> of valour<S>2428</S>, an hundred<S>3967</S> twenty<S>6242</S> and eight<S>8083</S>: and their overseer<S>6496</S> was Zabdiel<S>2068</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of one of the great men<S>1419</S>. <sup>the son: or, the son of Haggedolim</sup>
Also of the Levites<S>3881</S>: Shemaiah<S>8098</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Hashub<S>2815</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Azrikam<S>5840</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hashabiah<S>2811</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Bunni<S>1138</S>;
And Shabbethai<S>7678</S> and Jozabad<S>3107</S>, of the chief<S>7218</S> of the Levites<S>3881</S>, had the oversight of the outward<S>2435</S> business<S>4399</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of God<S>430</S>. <sup>had: Heb. were over</sup>
And Mattaniah<S>4983</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Micha<S>4316</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zabdi<S>2067</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Asaph<S>623</S>, was the principal<S>7218</S> to begin<S>8462</S> the thanksgiving<S>3034</S> in prayer<S>8605</S>: and Bakbukiah<S>1229</S> the second<S>4932</S> among his brethren<S>251</S>, and Abda<S>5653</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Shammua<S>8051</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Galal<S>1559</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Jeduthun<S>3038</S>.
All the Levites<S>3881</S> in the holy<S>6944</S> city<S>5892</S> were two hundred<S>3967</S> fourscore<S>8084</S> and four<S>702</S>.
Moreover the porters<S>7778</S>, Akkub<S>6126</S>, Talmon<S>2929</S>, and their brethren<S>251</S> that kept<S>8104</S> the gates<S>8179</S>, were an hundred<S>3967</S> seventy<S>7657</S> and two<S>8147</S>. <sup>the gates: Heb. at the gates</sup>
And the residue<S>7605</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, of the priests<S>3548</S>, and the Levites<S>3881</S>, were in all the cities<S>5892</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, every one<S>376</S> in his inheritance<S>5159</S>.
But the Nethinims<S>5411</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> in Ophel<S>6077</S>: and Ziha<S>6727</S> and Gispa<S>1658</S> were over the Nethinims<S>5411</S>. <sup>Ophel: or, the tower</sup>
The overseer<S>6496</S> also of the Levites<S>3881</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S> was Uzzi<S>5813</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Bani<S>1137</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hashabiah<S>2811</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Mattaniah<S>4983</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Micha<S>4316</S>. Of the sons<S>1121</S> of Asaph<S>623</S>, the singers<S>7891</S> were over<S>5048</S> the business<S>4399</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of God<S>430</S>.
For it was the king's<S>4428</S> commandment<S>4687</S> concerning them, that a certain portion<S>548</S> should be for the singers<S>7891</S>, due<S>1697</S> for every day<S>3117</S>. <sup>a certain: or, a sure ordinance</sup>
And Pethahiah<S>6611</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Meshezabeel<S>4898</S>, of the children<S>1121</S> of Zerah<S>2226</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, was at the king's<S>4428</S> hand<S>3027</S> in all matters<S>1697</S> concerning the people<S>5971</S>. <sup>Zerah: or, Zarah</sup>
And for the villages<S>2691</S>, with their fields<S>7704</S>, some of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> at Kirjatharba<S>7153</S>, and in the villages<S>2691</S> thereof, and at Dibon<S>1769</S>, and in the villages<S>1323</S> thereof, and at Jekabzeel<S>3343</S>, and in the villages<S>1323</S> thereof,
And at Jeshua<S>3442</S>, and at Moladah<S>4137</S>, and at Bethphelet<S>1046</S>,
And at Hazarshual<S>2705</S>, and at Beersheba<S>884</S>, and in the villages<S>1323</S> thereof,
And at Ziklag<S>6860</S>, and at Mekonah<S>4368</S>, and in the villages<S>1323</S> thereof,
And at Enrimmon<S>5884</S>, and at Zareah<S>6881</S>, and at Jarmuth<S>3412</S>,
Zanoah<S>2182</S>, Adullam<S>5725</S>, and in their villages<S>2691</S>, at Lachish<S>3923</S>, and the fields<S>7704</S> thereof, at Azekah<S>5825</S>, and in the villages<S>1323</S> thereof. And they dwelt<S>2583</S> from Beersheba<S>884</S> unto the valley<S>1516</S> of Hinnom<S>2011</S>.
The children<S>1121</S> also of Benjamin<S>1144</S> from Geba<S>1387</S> dwelt at Michmash<S>4363</S>, and Aija<S>5857</S>, and Bethel<S>1008</S>, and in their villages<S>1323</S>, <sup>from: or, of</sup> <sup>at: or, to</sup>
And at Anathoth<S>6068</S>, Nob<S>5011</S>, Ananiah<S>6055</S>,
Hazor<S>2674</S>, Ramah<S>7414</S>, Gittaim<S>1664</S>,
Hadid<S>2307</S>, Zeboim<S>6650</S>, Neballat<S>5041</S>,
Lod<S>3850</S>, and Ono<S>207</S>, the valley<S>1516</S> of craftsmen<S>2791</S> <S>2798</S>.
And of the Levites<S>3881</S> were divisions<S>4256</S> in Judah<S>3063</S>, and in Benjamin<S>1144</S>.
